message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping for a lower price. Would you consider selling it to me for $130?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss $140?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Would you consider selling the product to me for $135?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make it worth my while. How about we meet at $145?
I see you're trying to find a middle ground, Alice. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Could we agree on this price?
